text: Ne nobareeba mbu niwina waloonga likulu nende eshialo, balaboola mbu : “ni Nyasaye” boola mbu : “koo mulola murie biamulaamanga ebilali Nyasaye, Nyasaye niyenya okhuwumisia aba nyasaye abo banyala okhwihabina, nohomba nabenyenyela tsimbabaasi bo bakhekalila tsimbabaasi tsitsie? Boola mbu: “Nyasaye yambela ne khuye bamwisiche bokhumwisika.”
